wiki.content:
"Always Be My Baby" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Hot R&B Singles Chart in the Spring of 1996.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Always Be My Baby" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Hot R&B Singles Chart in the Spring of 1996.
